title: Nutrition and Alzheimer's disease.
summary: Alzheimer's disease is no longer considered an inevitable consequence of the aging process. ...Nutrition support is important in the treatment of people with Alzheimer's disease....
abstract: Alzheimer's disease is no longer considered an inevitable consequence of the aging process. The etiology is complex, involving several genes and possible environmental factors. Nutrition support is important in the treatment of people with Alzheimer's disease.
